summary: REQ-2 and REQ-3 appear implemented via new static assets under frontend/public. REQ-1 is present but the shown file content includes an extra trailing blank line. REQ-4 and REQ-5 are not evidenced in the provided SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION.md truncation / other docs. The diff summary also indicates multiple unrequested frontend code/UI changes (and updates to project metadata) that violate the stated constraint to limit changes to static assets and documentation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure `frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains` contains exactly two lines: `dirtydaves.co.uk` and `www.dirtydaves.co.uk` with no extra spaces/quotes/trailing blank lines.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows an extra blank line at the end of the file content, implying a trailing newline/blank line beyond the two required lines, so the content does not match the exact two-line requirement.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update `frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION.md` to reflect the new expected `/.well-known/ic-domains` two-line content (including `www`) and add a verification check for `/.well-known/ii-alternative-origins` returning the exact JSON payload.
missing_requirements.reason: The shown (truncated) modifications to `frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION.md` do not include any visible 'Custom Domain Verification' updates nor steps to fetch/verify `/.well-known/ic-domains` and `/.well-known/ii-alternative-origins`.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a post-deploy checklist note in an existing deployment/production doc including the provided DNS records verbatim and the optional boundary-node registration/status URLs/command.
missing_requirements.reason: No documentation file changes in the diff summary show the required DNS record block or the provided curl/URL status entries.
evidence: file-diff summary (no other production/deployment doc shown as modified)

hallucinated_features.description: Multiple frontend application code/UI changes (new routes, landing page/hero/CTA/style changes, contact form behavior changes, Tailwind config changes, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints require keeping changes limited to static asset files and documentation and explicitly say not to modify immutable frontend paths; the diff summary indicates extensive frontend source changes unrelated to `.well-known` assets and docs.

hallucinated_features.description: Modification of `project_state.json` to add/update internal tracking entries for AR-1..AR-6.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest; requirement scope is limited to static assets and documentation for custom domain verification and deployment checklist notes.
